channel.title: CVE Feed for nko -- Advanced WordPress Backgrounds
channel.description: The latest CVEs for nko -- Advanced WordPress Backgrounds

item.title: CVE-2024-8045|2024-09-11T13:15:58.773Z -- nko -- advanced%20wordpress%20backgrounds
item.description: The Advanced WordPress Backgrounds plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the ‘imageTag’ parameter in all versions up to, and including, 1.12.3 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-8045|2024-09-11T07:31:33.110Z -- nko -- advanced%20wordpress%20backgrounds
item.description: The Advanced WordPress Backgrounds plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the ‘imageTag’ parameter in all versions up to, and including, 1.12.3 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
